item.title: About
item.description: ⊕ ⊕ It’s my jolly face! I play with code and pianos. I am a PhD student at the University of Oregon studying finance. I have a master’s in finance from the ICMA Centre at the Henley Business School (which itself is part of the University of Reading), and a BSc in Technical Theater from Southern Oregon University. I’m a developer for Turing.jl, a probabilistic programming tool. My interests are pretty broad in finance, but in general I tend to favor situations where technology is involed (with some classic asset pricing stuff too):
